member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_ORIENTATION
member.summary: Defines the set of display orientation modes for a window (app view). Used by and.

member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_ORIENTATION.AVO_LANDSCAPE
member.summary: The window is in landscape orientation, with the display width greater than the height.

member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_ORIENTATION.AVO_PORTRAIT
member.summary: The window is in portrait orientation, with the display height greater than the width.
